testsuite.name: dslab.scenario.lab1.TransferMailboxScenarioTest

testcase.name: scen_03_failureMessage

failure.message: java.lang.AssertionError: expected a mail from mailer@ in inbox Expected: a string containing "mailer@" but: was "no mails for this users"
